meanings.definition: The area or location next to a rink.
meanings.sent1: We sat at the rinkside to watch the ice skaters.
meanings.sent2: The fans cheered loudly from the rinkside during the hockey game.
meanings.sent3: The rinkside was so close, I could almost touch the ice!
meanings.sent4: The rinkside felt like a front-row seat to all the action on the ice.
meanings.sent5: The view from the rinkside was breathtaking as the skaters glided gracefully.

meanings.definition: Situated or located next to a rink.
meanings.sent1: The rinkside seats offered a perfect view of the game.
meanings.sent2: The cozy rinkside cafe served hot chocolate to the skaters.
meanings.sent3: The rinkside shop sold all kinds of souvenirs for the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The rinkside atmosphere was filled with excitement and energy.
meanings.sent5: The rinkside area was bustling with activity as people prepared to skate.
